text: The Technion – Israel Institute of Technology () is a public university for engineering studies. It is located in Haifa, Israel. The Technion was established in 1912. The original building is now the Israel National Museum of Science, Technology, and Space. == Other websites == *New renderings of Cornell-Technion Campus in New York City *Technion – Israel Institute of Technology website Category:Colleges and universities in Israel Category:Buildings and structures in Haifa Category:1912 establishments in Asia Category:1910s establishments in Israel
title: Technion – Israel Institute of Technology
